    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        Board Constructor. It runs only once to create whole board.

    • Method Detail

      • initBoard

        private void initBoard()
        Method responds for loading whole game. Creates some necessary objects. It also make sure, that array's are correct state. Also set's variable informationPanelType on proper state to init starting message.

      • loadImages

        private void loadImages()
        Method loads all necessary sprites

      • loadImage

        private java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadImage(java.lang.String nameOfFile)
        Method which is responsible for file management and loading graphics from outside file.
        Parameters:
        nameOfFile - Name of file from which graphics will be loaded.
        Returns:
        Returns buffer with image data.

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Method is responsible for drawing all screen content. It's called each time, whenever changes on board are made. Method also creates some objects. For example: monster move, screen resize or repaint method.
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
        Parameters:
        g - Actual graphic of JFrame frame.

      • getScaleValueForScreen

        private void getScaleValueForScreen()
        Sets global screen scale x and y. Scale is being created, basing on the least screen resolution set. Game elements are being positioned due to scale.

      • scaleValueForScreen

        private int scaleValueForScreen(int value,
                                int axis)
        Calculates proper pixel value for the specific object, depending on screen scale.
        Parameters:
        value - Value in pixels
        axis - Axis 0 is X | Axis 1 is Y
        Returns:
        Returns scaled value

      • addGameText

        private void addGameText(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Method add objects to listOfStrings.
        Parameters:
        g - Actual JFrame Graphics

      • getGameDisplayTime

        private java.lang.String getGameDisplayTime()
        Method which calculate seconds on more common format and pack it to one String.
        Returns:
        String with calculated min/sec of actual time.

      • setProperCordsForTowerTextureAccordingToLevel

        private void setProperCordsForTowerTextureAccordingToLevel(Tower temp,
                                                           int tower)
        Allows me to set proper cord texture to object depends on level.
        Parameters:
        temp - Temporary object of TowerList
        tower - Type of tower 1-Red 2-Green 3-Blue

      • turretCheckForEnemy

        private void turretCheckForEnemy()
        Method checks, if there is enemy in tower range. Checks every tower every time, whenever Screen changes.
